page.title: 11TECHNOLOGICAL PROGRESS IN BN
page.content: All farmers reported dramatic mechanical take over. TRACTORS: All farms have old and new tractors.New tractors have safety cab;the old tractors didn't even have roll bars.Wheels are now much bigger.There is a different lock on the back wheels.The horse power has increased from 60 h.p. to 300 h.p.The mass of a new tractor is four times greater.Inside the new cabs there are Citizens Band Radio, stereos, air conditioning, sound insulation, a sun roof and well sprung seats.One farmer borrows a new tractor from a neighbouring farm.The newest tractor cost Â£20,000. FEEDING:All feeding used to be done by hand.Now food falls automatically into the feeders.One farm is highly computerised.
